description: Some are worried that more electricity retailers will soon drop out. Read more at straitstimes.com.
title: Some Singapore households taking steps to slash energy use amid spike in electricity prices
title_page: Some Singapore households taking steps to slash energy use amid spike in electricity prices | The Straits Times
maintext:
SINGAPORE - Some households in Singapore are taking steps to cut down on energy consumption, amid a spike in electricity prices here.
These include limiting the use of air conditioners, with one family saying they would try to gather in a room to minimise the use of electricity.
